targets.query: SELECT count("return_code") FROM "$mycloud" WHERE ("cmd" = 'ssh') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("return_code") FROM "$mycloud" WHERE ("cmd" = 'ssh') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT count("return_code") FROM "$mycloud" WHERE ("cmd" = 'ssh') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("return_code") FROM "$mycloud" WHERE ("cmd" = 'ssh') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT "duration" FROM "$mycloud" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

SELECT mean("duration") FROM /^$mycloud$/ WHERE ("cmd"::tag =~ /^$mywait$/ AND ("method"::tag = 'act' OR "method"::tag = 'ACTIVE')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "cmd"::tag, "method"::tag fill(none)

SELECT mean("duration") FROM /^$mycloud$/ WHERE ("cmd"::tag =~ /^$mywait$/ AND ("method"::tag = 'act' OR "method"::tag = 'ACTIVE')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "cmd"::tag, "method"::tag fill(none)

SELECT mean("duration") FROM /^$mycloud$/ WHERE ("cmd"::tag =~ /^$mywait$/ AND ("method"::tag = 'act' OR "method"::tag = 'ACTIVE')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "cmd"::tag, "method"::tag fill(none)

SELECT mean("duration") FROM /^$mycloud$/ WHERE ("cmd"::tag =~ /^$mywait$/ AND "method"::tag !~ /^\(ACTIVE\|XDELX\|available\)^/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "cmd"::tag, "method"::tag fill(none)

custom.axisLabel: s, Gb/s, s, %maxt*10, s*10, MB/s, IO/s, %

list.query: show tag values with key = cmd

list.definition: show tag values with key = method where cmd =~ /$mycmd/
list.label: method
list.name: mymethod
list.query: show tag values with key = method where cmd =~ /$mycmd/
